long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TabRight: The Intuitive Link Opener

Unleash a smoother browsing experience with TabRight. This Chrome extension simplifies the way you open links. With just a right-click, open any link in a new tab, right next to your current one. No more using the middle mouse button or navigating through context menus. TabRight is perfect for users who multitask, research, or simply like to keep their browsing organized.

Key Features:

Instant Tab Opening: Right-click on any link to open it in a new tab.
Organized Browsing: New tabs are systematically placed next to your current tab in the order they're clicked.
Full Control: Easily toggle the functionality on or off with our sleek popup interface.
Minimalistic Design: A simple and clean design ensures no clutter and a seamless browsing experience.
Step up your browsing game and make opening tabs a breeze with TabRight!
